name: ext_R2_MedicationStatement_reasonForUse
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.MedicationStatement.reasonForUse[x] for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationStatement.reasonForUse[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationStatement|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R3.

element.short: A reason for why the medication is being/was taken.
element.definition: `MedicationStatement.reasonForUse[x]` maps to R3 `MedicationStatement.reasonCode`. To multiple elements in MedicationStatement: (`MedicationStatement.reasonCode`, `MedicationStatement.reasonReference`).  Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `MedicationStatement.reasonForUse[x]` maps to R3 `MedicationStatement.reasonReference`. To multiple elements in MedicationStatement: (`MedicationStatement.reasonCode`, `MedicationStatement.reasonReference`). Target added Reference target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Observation Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
